name: Inmune
description:
Synopsis:

This is like every Zombie Apocalipse, you were infected, but in this time, you have to show that you are the chosen one, the one that is INMUNE to this chaotic virus. Only ONE White Blood Cell is standing between DOOM and SALVATION. Kill 100 virues and don't let the fever got you more than 45C or you will be dead! 

History:

This game was developed for the Nerdearla Game Jame based on the concept "cuerpo fisico, cuerpo interior" ("physic body, inner body") using Unreal Engine 5

Concept/Level Design/Development: ShadowDrone

3D Arts/Animations for Veins, white/red blood cells and virus: Dox ( https://eedox.itch.io/)

Music Score: Franco Robledo (https://megafrancolo.itch.io/)

Logo Art: a random logo generated by https://looka.com/

UI : Lyra Starter from Epic Games

Techinical Development  Stuff :

Developed 95% in C++ using a custom clean Lyra Starte game version, adapted exclusively to this project (was not a work over Lyra Game, the source code is Inmune Game code).

- Bluprints, C++,  base C++ and customizable blue prints events/functions for try and then to be migrated to C++ in a future

- Delegates, - Overlap Events

- Behavior Trees with Tasks for different virus.

- Zombie attacks using AI in the minimap, and the Human defends using timing overlapping events.

- SceneComponents to use as infection vector on Zombies and Virus.

- Nanite meshes for Red Cells streams.

- Rotation physics

- Virus/Cells/Zombi spawns every X seconds. 

- Github for SCM (aprox 78 commits in 3 days)
- UI: Lyra Widgets.
